Pre-Game Insights: Hungary hasn't suffered a defeat since September 2022, when they lost 2-0 to Italy in the UEFA Nations League. Since then, they've amassed an unbeaten streak of 12 matches, including a flawless 2023 campaign.

Turkey also topped Group D with just one loss in the qualifiers. For Turkey, this match is crucial for gaining momentum and extending their unbeaten run of four matches, which includes victories against Germany and Croatia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played in the Puskás Aréna, Budapest, Hungary.
The Hungarians will compete in Group A and Turkey in Group F in the UEFA Euro 2024, set to be held in Germany.
Others: The match will be streamed for free on Fubo, and can also be watched on Fox Soccer Plus.
